text: The Monsterican Dream is an album from the Finnish hard rock/heavy metal band Lordi. == Track listing == # Threatical Trailer – 01:09 # Bring It On (The Raging Hounds Return) – 04:35 # Blood Red Sandman – 04:03 # My Heaven Is Your Hell – 03:41 # Pet the Destroyer – 03:50 # The Children of the Night – 03:45 # Wake the Snake – 03:46 # Shotgun Divorce – 04:42 # Forsaken Fashion Dolls – 03:43 # Haunted Town – 03:13 # Fire in the Hole – 03:27 # Magistra Nocte – 01:33 # Kalmageddon – 04:33 Category:Lordi albums Category:2004 albums
title: The Monsterican Dream
